game.name: Abyssal Anarchy
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A fast-paced co-op spell-hell where each map pulls you deeper into the Abyss. Choose from 5 heroes and 14 spells, unlock upgrades, and survive alone or with friends as the magic grows wilder with every descent.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A fast-paced co-op spell-hell where each map pulls you deeper into the Abyss. Choose from 5 heroes and 14 spells, unlock upgrades, and survive alone or with friends as the magic grows wilder with every descent.
